Content-Type: text/plain; charset=ISO-8859-1

We have been running a crawl job for 18 days under the
ReschedulingProcessor. As seen in the attached chart, the crawler's
throughput is generally gradually going down. Is this normal for a
rescheduling crawl job? Does it continue to slow down indefinitely? Are
there any measures to take to help keep the rate steady?




-- 
Mahmoud A. Mubarak
Bibliotheca Alexandrina

--e89a8ffba1c5a8b6a504b965cce1
Content-Type: text/html; charset=ISO-8859-1

<div dir="ltr"><p>We have been running a crawl job for 18 days under the
      ReschedulingProcessor. As seen in the attached chart, the
      crawler's throughput is generally gradually going down. Is this
      normal for a rescheduling crawl job? Does it continue to slow down
      indefinitely? Are there any measures to take to help keep the rate
      steady?</p>
    <p><br>
    </p><br clear="all"><br>-- <br>Mahmoud A. Mubarak<br>Bibliotheca Alexandrina<br>
</div>

--e89a8ffba1c5a8b6a504b965cce1--


--e89a8ffba1c5a8b6a804b965cce3
